metadata.synopsis: AD played by a hag survivor when they spot a party member wearing a hag mask.The AD is used just for flavor and as reactivity.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Hag was defeated in Act I- With selected character  Recon: give S_LOW_BlushingMermaid_HagMask_04- Equip the mask- Go up to any hag survivor in their building, -54; 15; -143

0.speaker: Mask of Regret
0.text: Ah, come on. I don't need to see that thing.
0.context: NodeContext: player has shown up wearing a hag mask. Annoyed.

1.speaker: Mask of Regret
1.text: Ethel is the last thing I need to think about.
1.context: NodeContext: player has shown up wearing a hag mask. Annoyed.

2.speaker: Mask of Regret
2.text: Mate, my head pounds with that mask around. How can you stand it?
2.context: NodeContext: player has shown up wearing a hag mask. Annoyed.
